name: Over Time (Demo)
description:
You suddenly realise that you are in a huge construction site of some sort. You do not know how you got there, who you are nor how to get out. Can you escape using only only that provided to you by the environment of a construction site? Are you alone or is there something watching you?

NOTE THAT THIS IS ONLY THE DEMO AND THAT IT WILL NOT INCLUDE ALL FEATURES INCLUDED IN THE FULL GAME!

Minimum Specs: 4Gb RAM, Intel Core i3, 750Mb Storage

This game contains flashing images and is played at own risk.
